channel.title: Raviraja's Blog
channel.description: Blogs about Deep Learning and NLP

item.title: MLOps Basics [Week 0]: Project Setup
item.description: The goal of the series is to understand the basics of MLOps (model building, monitoring, configurations, testing, packaging, deployment, cicd). As a first step, Let's setup the project first.
item.author: raviraja.ghanta@gmail.com (Raviraja Ganta)

item.title: Introducing Tailwind Nexjs Starter Blog
item.description: Looking for a performant, out of the box template, with all the best in web technology to support your blogging needs? Checkout the Tailwind Nextjs Starter Blog template.
item.author: raviraja.ghanta@gmail.com (Raviraja Ganta)
